My blood Pressures

Age

  • Raw Data
  • Logarithmic Data

My Blood pressure histogram

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LoginService } from '../login.service'; import { GeneralApiService } from '../general-api.service'; import { Observable, first } from 'rxjs'; import { UserBloodPressure } from '../model/user-blood-pressure'; @Component({ selector: 'app-hostogram', templateUrl: './histogram.component.html', styleUrls: ['./histogram.component.scss'], }) export class HistogramComponent implements OnInit { token!: string; isRawDisplay = true; bloodPressureRangeRaw!: number[]; bloodPressureRangeLogarithmic!: number[]; frequencyNumber = [20,40,60,80,100].reverse(); bloodPressure$!: Observable; constructor( private loginService: LoginService, private api: GeneralApiService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.bloodPressureRangeRaw = this.generateRawRange(); this.bloodPressureRangeLogarithmic = this.generateLogarithmicRange(); // this.token = this.loginService.LoginToken; // this.api.getUserBloodPressure(this.token) // .pipe(first()) // .subscribe({ // next: data => { // let what = data; // } // }) } switchPanel(isRaw: boolean){ this.isRawDisplay = isRaw; } generateRawRange(){ let result = []; let start = 80; while(start <= 180){ result.push(start); start += 10; } return result; } generateLogarithmicRange(){ let result = []; let start = 4.0; while(start <= 5.5){ result.push(start); start += 0.5; } return result; } }
